image.altText: A screenshot of CCTV footage of an aggravated robbery committed by two people in black hoodies and face masks.

props.synopsis: A 16-year-old boy is accused of committing aggravated robberies against two separate men in Canberra within the space of an hour.

title.children: Teenage boy accused of committing two aggravated robberies in one night

image.altText: A close shot of Dutton, wearing glasses.

props.synopsis: Opposition Leader Peter Dutton says women looking for flexible work can find job-sharing arrangements, defending a Coalition promise to order public servants to return to the office five days a week.

title.children: Return to office order wouldn't disadvantage women, Dutton says

image.altText: boxing glove

props.synopsis: Some parents say they saw an almost immediate improvement in their children's self-confidence after starting martial arts. But it's not about using violence to address violence.

title.children: Frustrated with bullying, these parents enrolled their kids in self-defence

image.altText: David speaks into a microphone as supporters' signs wave behind him and a guy holds a guitar.

props.synopsis: Former military lawyer David McBride challenges his jail sentence for distributing classified material to journalists over a ruling he says deprived him of a defence.

title.children: Jailed whistleblower David McBride appeals conviction

image.altText: Wild horses grazing in an alpine area.

props.synopsis: NSW Environment Minister Penny Sharpe has indicated that the wild horse management program at Kosciuszko National Park is ahead of schedule and that between 3,000 and 4,000 animals remain.

title.children: Brumby numbers 'way down' in Kosciuszko, aerial shooting paused

image.altText: A 10-year-old boy in a Ferrari cap stands on a karting track with his arms crossed.

props.synopsis: While other Year 5 students are playing football or reading a book, Canberran Lazarus Añonuevo is turning heads on go-karting circuits around Australia and overseas in his pursuit to become a Formula One driver.

title.children: Canberra go-karting prodigy making Formula One dream a reality

image.altText: A man smiles for the camera

props.synopsis: Nicole Williams pleaded guilty to attempted aggravated burglary and accessory after the fact to murder for her involvement in the death of Glenn Walewicz, and was today sentenced to seven years in jail.

title.children: It was a killing that baffled police. Now its mastermind has been jailed

image.altText: A fishing boat listing on the ocean after crashing into rocks.

props.synopsis: Beaches at a popular New South Wales Far South Coast tourist town have become littered with debris after a commercial fishing vessel ran aground this week.

title.children: Idyllic beaches littered with debris and diesel from NSW shipwreck

image.altText: Carl Dean kissing Dolly Parton on the cheek

props.synopsis: Carl Dean's flirtation with a bank teller gave his wife Dolly Parton the inspiration for one of her most iconic songs.

title.children: Dolly Parton pays tribute to husband of nearly 60 years

image.altText: A plastic surgeon operates on a patient.

props.synopsis: The South Eastern Sydney Local Health District is urging anyone who has had infusions, injections or underwent any invasive procedures at the Ketthip Clinic in Sydney to get tested.

title.children: Cosmetic clients urged to get tested after 'concerning' find at Sydney clinic

image.altText: Purple lunch box with vegetables and fruit and a lettuce and chicken sandwich.

props.synopsis: A major international study has found children and adolescents in Australia have experienced some of the fastest transitions to obesity in the world.

title.children: 'Monumental societal failure': Child obesity rates set to soar

image.altText: A small mouse-like marsupial standing on sand, with a fat tail.

props.synopsis: Environment Minister Tanya Plibsersek is being taken to federal court by a conservation group over failure to list recovery plans for 11 threatened species.

title.children: 'Nature can't wait': Plibersek taken to court over threatened species

image.altText: UKRAINE Anthony Albanese, Myroshnychenko Vasyl, Peter Dutton20230216_025307390_iOS

props.synopsis: A government spokesperson had earlier said such a move was not being considered, and Peter Dutton has said he does not see a need.

title.children: Albanese 'open' to Australian troops joining Ukrainian peacekeeping coalition

image.altText: Star Casino

props.synopsis: Star Entertainment is falling into deeper financial trouble and its pockets are empty. Experts say the distressed company is likely to enter voluntary administration as its attempts to secure a financial lifeline go down to the wire. So what does the future look like?

title.children: Star is on the brink of collapse. What are its options?

image.altText: Donald Trump grimacing while wearing a blue suit, red tie and red MAGA hat on a backdrop of blurred tree branches

props.synopsis: The US has confirmed he will enforce 25 per cent tariffs on goods, and financial experts say the impacts of a North American trade war could rebound across the globe.

title.children: Trump tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China could spark global trade war

image.altText: SpaceX Starship launching off the launch pad with a ball of fire sending up smoke

props.synopsis: SpaceX calls off its eighth Starship test flight from Texas over an unspecified issue on the rocket system's core ship.

title.children: SpaceX pulls the pin on Starship launch with 40 seconds to spare

image.altText: A firefighter in a yellow jacket and red helmet stands with back to camera among scrub, looking at burning tree

props.synopsis: Climate change is predicted to increase the likelihood of city fires worldwide, according to a historical study conducted by Australian and international researchers.

title.children: Cities more likely to burn as the world warms, research warns

image.altText: An impression of large white wind turbines in the ocean

props.synopsis: Flotation Energy walks away from a major green power project off the Victorian coast, following a court battle with the government and subsequent changes to offshore wind legislation.

title.children: $6b offshore wind farm dead after federal government refuses licence

props.synopsis: WA Premier Roger Cook says his depiction of US Vice-President JD Vance as a "knob" was a lighthearted comment not meant to cause offence.

title.children: WA Premier Roger Cook apologises for calling JD Vance a 'knob'

image.altText: A tall fence with razor wire attached at the bottom and top. Blue sky and some jail buildings in the background.

props.synopsis: Private security guards will soon work alongside Northern Territory correctional staff after the NT government signed a contract with controversial global security firm G4S.

title.children: Private security firm G4S to help manage record high NT prisoner numbers

image.altText: Rescue crews scour metal containers to find people after an avalanche in the Himalayas

props.synopsis: Rescuers recovered 46 people from debris after an avalanche hit a construction camp last week near Mana village on the border with Tibet.

title.children: Rescuers find 46 people alive after being buried in Himalayan avalance

image.altText: A man with grey hair in a grey jumper over a blue collared shirt stands on a rocky beach on a sunny day near a building site.

props.synopsis: A man who oversaw the construction of a concrete seawall in front of his beachfront mansion without a permit has vowed to tear it down and rehabilitate the section of beach it was built on.

title.children: Man behind Frankston Beach seawall vows to tear it down and 'move out'

image.altText: A blonde teenager poses for a photo wearing a football jersey

props.synopsis: A teenager pleads guilty over a fatal crash that killed Nick Campo in Perth's south last year.

title.children: Family welcomes guilty plea from driver over crash that killed Perth footballer

image.altText: A man wearing a blue shirt talks to the media

props.synopsis: About 2,000 Palmerston voters have been shifted into the federal NT seat of Solomon, which has been held by Labor for a record three terms.

title.children: 'I am everywhere': Labor MP bullish despite NT electorate shake-up

image.altText: An aerial photo shows a township with large green areas and a river running towards the coastline.

props.synopsis: In small towns across Australia, the lack of funding for infrastructure like sewerage, water supply and power is holding back projects that locals say could make a big difference in increasing the housing supply.

title.children: Land around small towns needs to become 'development-ready'

image.altText: Joanne Ciconte posing for a photograph, zipping up her racing suit.

props.synopsis: Australia will be represented in the all-female Formula 1 Academy series for the first time, with teenagers Joanne Ciconte and Aiva Anagnostiadis joining the grid for the 2025 season.

title.children: Aussie teens chasing history in all-female F1 Academy

image.altText: A man in high-vis trades blows with a young person in a shopping centre.

props.synopsis: Witnesses, including children, were terrified as the violence unfolded at Bendigo Marketplace. Four teenagers have since been arrested.

title.children: Shopping centre locked down as teens allegedly bash security guard

image.altText: A row of 12 guns resting diagonally on the front of a white car.

props.synopsis: A third man has faced court in New South Wales charged over an alleged robbery in South Australia in which collectable coins worth $1 million, cash and firearms were stolen.

title.children: Third man nabbed in alleged $1m collectable coin robbery

image.altText: A middle-aged man in a pink shirt standing, looking at the camera at Southbank in Brisbane.

props.synopsis: The government is preparing to fund the use of MDMA and psylocibin, otherwise known as ecstasy and magic mushrooms, as a treatment for Australian veterans battling trauma and depression.

title.children: Veterans with PTSD may soon have access to psychedelic therapy

image.altText: An aircraft with two lights on the front and one at the back hovers in the night sky

props.synopsis: Experts say it's likely the drone was collecting information for the Chinese navy to use, but the country's foreign minister isn't happy.

title.children: Drone spotted near Australia-PNG border suspected to be from Chinese navy

image.altText: An older couple hug as they admire a beach view

props.synopsis: Baby boomers are set to bequeath trillions to younger generations in the coming years. It raises ethical questions not just for recipients, but the people leaving wealth behind.

title.children: 'Sitting around waiting for you to die': The ethics of inheritance

image.altText: A white greater glider in a tree at night, looks at the camera, lots of leaves in the background.

props.synopsis: The endangered marsupials' population in part of the southern Blue Mountains has increased by 45 per cent since before the fires began in 2019.

title.children: Greater gliders' 'spectacular' recovery after Blue Mountains bushfires

image.altText: A retail worker wearing an Ikea yellow high-vis t-shirt stands near shelves of goods holding a small device

props.synopsis: Retail employers argue staff should have the option to condense a full time week into four days, but some union officials say it's a ploy to have staff work longer hours and avoid overtime pay.

title.children: 'Better balance': Retail workers accept four-day work week, but it's not for everyone

image.altText: A kitchen tap filling an air fryer basket with water and suds

props.synopsis: Although they use little to no added oil, grease and fat can accumulate inside air fryers making them difficult to clean

title.children: How to clean your air fryer without scrubbing

image.altText: Three men in an old car all smiling.

props.synopsis: This simple father-son road trip film — where a man and his best friend try to make his father smile again — has become the most popular Swedish documentary of all time.

title.children: A son reckons with his dad's mortality in this shockingly funny doc
